Description: It is a global interventional cardiovascular devices company that delivers world-class products and services. Having a global presence with its headquarters based at India and Germany enables them to initiate the deep, research-driven clinical processes for creating newer advantage technologies. It is present in over 50 countries across the world, enriching the lives of more than 1 million patients. The company specializes in offering a range of products including stents, balloons, diagnostic catheters, introducer sheath and other related accessories, helping the clients to improve clinical outcomes for various cardiac disorders by providing global access to a broad portfolio of innovative quality productsIt is a global interventional cardiovascular devices company that delivers world-class products and services.
